structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Work for More Hours Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of work hours availability categories indicating whether employed individuals are available or wish to work more hours than their current employment provides.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Available to work more hours
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals who are currently employed and are available to work more hours than their current employment provides.

structure:Code.common:Name: Wish to work more hours
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals who are currently employed and wish to work more hours than their current employment provides, regardless of availability.
